content: It serves as a trilogy of care: care for our patients, care for our employees, and care for the communities we serve. It involves employee and patient recognition, team-building opportunities, celebrations, and regional events. Employee Recognition Patient Recognition Team-building Celebrations Regional Events Programs DCC Ambassadors DCC Ambassadors is our Employee Recognition Award. A company-wide selection process helps nominate DCC Ambassadors. We recognize the outstanding contributions of each member of our DCC Family. Learn More DCC Champions DCC Champions is our Patient Recognition Award. Through the program, Dialysis Care Center addresses the issue of missed dialysis treatments. We recognize and celebrate our patients for prioritizing their dialysis treatments each month. The program focuses on service excellence, patient-centered care, enhanced customer service training, exceptional customer service, prioritizing team approach, and improvement of the quality of life for patients.
